title: Input Validation and Output Formatting
description: Create a program that takes a user's name, age, and favorite color as input, validates that the age is a positive integer, and then prints out a formatted greeting message including the user's name, age, and favorite color. If the age is not a positive integer, print an error message.
sample_output: Hello, John Doe! You are 25 years old and your favorite color is Blue.
